Login to the Member Center Make a donation Donate your car Corporate sponsorship CPR Shop Politics Money Arts Justice Environment Newsletter Ways to support **Join CPR at the Juneteenth Music Festival** **When** Sunday, June 15, 2025 12:00 PM – 8:00 PM **Where** **Event Description** Colorado Public Radio is proud to be a media sponsor of the Juneteenth Music Festival, taking placeJune 15 in Denver's historic Five Points neighborhood. Come visit our booth and say hello! Learn more about the festival at:https://www.juneteenthmusicfestival.com/ **Price** Free **More Info** www.juneteenthmusicfestival.com **Event Contact** Colorado Public Radio 303-871-9191 [email protected] https://www.cpr.org/about/contact/ **Categories** Concerts / Live Music Fairs and Festivals Family Friendly In-Person **Ways To Support CPR** You make the news and music from Colorado Public Radio possible. Your active support builds our community, grounds us in shared experiences, and improves the lives of Coloradans. Support the stories and songs you and your neighbors rely on!
